tool_description: Giving meaning to each playing poker cards
name: Poker Cards Cartomancy
title: Poker Cards Cartomancy

api_list.name: Get one card
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poker-cards-cartomancy.p.rapidapi.com/api/poker/card"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poker-cards-cartomancy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
